info.title: Bills API
info.description: API to get and search for information regarding Bills, their stages, associated amendments and publications.

get.summary: Returns a list of amendments.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Amendments relating to a Bill with Bill ID specified

parameters.name: billStageId
parameters.description: Amendments relating to a Bill stage with Bill stage ID specified

get.summary: Returns an amendment.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Amendment relating to a bill with bill ID specified

parameters.name: billStageId
parameters.description: Amendment relating to a bill stage with bill stage ID specified

parameters.name: amendmentId
parameters.description: Amendment with amendment ID specified

get.summary: Returns a list of news articles for a Bill.
Returns a list of Bill types.
Returns a list of Bills.
Return a Bill.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Bill with ID specified

get.summary: Returns a Bill stage.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Bill stage relating to Bill with Bill ID specified

parameters.name: billStageId
parameters.description: Bill stage with ID specified

get.summary: Returns all Bill stages.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Stages relating to a Bill with Bill ID specified

get.summary: Return information on a document.

parameters.name: publicationId
parameters.description: Document with publication Id specified

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Document with Id specified

get.summary: Return a document.

parameters.name: publicationId
parameters.description: Document with publication Id specified

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Document with Id specified

get.summary: Returns a list of motions or amendments.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Motions or amendments relating to a Bill with Bill ID specified

parameters.name: billStageId
parameters.description: Motions or amendments relating to a Bill stage with Bill stage ID specified

get.summary: Returns amendment or motion detail.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Motions or amendments relating to a bill with bill ID specified

parameters.name: billStageId
parameters.description: Motions or amendments relating to a bill stage with bill stage ID specified

parameters.name: pingPongItemId
parameters.description: Motions or amendments with ping pong item ID specified

get.summary: Returns a list of publication types.
Return a list of Bill publications.

parameters.name: billId
parameters.description: Publications relating to Bill with Bill ID specified

get.summary: Return a list of Bill stage publications.
Returns an Rss feed of all Bills.
Returns an Rss feed of public Bills.
Returns an Rss feed of private Bills.
Returns an Rss feed of a certain Bill.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of Bill

get.summary: Returns a list of Sittings.
Returns a list of Bill stages.
